wikipedia_page.main:
Adam Charles Smyth (born 16 May 1981) is an English cricketer. Smyth is a right-handed batsman who bowls right-arm medium pace. He was born at Coventry, Warwickshire.
Smyth represented the Warwickshire Cricket Board in a single List A match against the Kent Cricket Board in the 2000 NatWest Trophy. In his only List A match, he scored 21 runs, while with the ball he took a single wicket at a cost of 32 runs.He currently plays club cricket for Kenilworth Wardens Cricket Club in the Birmingham and District Premier League.
